description: The adaptive object type of all adaptive object type objects.

allowAdd.brief: Objects of this type can be created
allowAdd.description: If false, objects of this type can NEVER be added via an adaptor. If true, objects of this type can be added via an adaptor as long as allowed by authorization policy and the adaptor.
allowAdd.label: Allow Add

allowChange.brief: Objects of this type can be changed
allowChange.description: If false, objects of this type can NEVER be changed via an adaptor. If true, objects of this type can be changed via an adaptor as long as allowed by authorization policy and the adaptor.
allowChange.label: Allow Change

allowDelete.brief: Objects of this type can be deleted
allowDelete.description: If false, objects of this type can NEVER be deleted via an adaptor. If true, objects of this type can be deleted via an adaptor as long as allowed by authorization policy and the adaptor.
allowDelete.label: Allow Delete

allowEntity.brief: Instances of this type can exist as entities
allowEntity.description: Instances of this object type can exist as an entity object, not just an embedded object.
allowEntity.label: Allow Entity

collectionURIs.brief: The URIs of the collections this object type is a part of
collectionURIs.description: This is the URIs of the collections this object type is a part of and preferably a URIs that can be used to locate an object with objects type _AdaptiveCollection_ that describes the collections. If a collection is used outside of the local instance, it should be a full URI. The URI can also be a local path of the collection object or just the collection's objectId if it resides in the in the same adaptor.
collectionURIs.label: Collection URIs

description.description: The description of the object type.
description.label: Description

descriptionPropertyName.brief: The name of the property that is used as the 'description' meta property
descriptionPropertyName.description: The name of the property in an instance that is used as the 'description' property in the meta for instances of this object type. If not specified, no description will be available.
descriptionPropertyName.label: Description Property Name

label.brief: Label used to identify this instance
label.description: Label used to identify this instance.
label.label: Label

objectIdPropertyName.brief: The name of the property that is used as the 'objectId' meta property
objectIdPropertyName.description: The name of the property in an instance that is used as the 'objectId' property in the meta for instances of this object type. If not specified, the internal adaptor objectId for an object is used.
objectIdPropertyName.label: Object Id Property Name

objectType.brief: Object id of the object type
objectType.description: The object id of the object type.
objectType.label: Object Type

originURI.brief: The origin URI of this object type
originURI.description: The origin URI of this object type. Descendant object types should be used for any deviations. This URI may be different from the URI within this instance of Adaptive Framework.
originURI.label: Origin URI

otherProperties.brief: Property Type for properties not explicitly specified
otherProperties.description: If specified, this is the property type for properties that are not explicitly specified. If otherProperties is not specified, only explicitly specified properties are allowed.
otherProperties.label: Other Properties

propertyTypes.brief: Describes the properties for this object type
propertyTypes.description: An object whose properties contain the _AdaptiveValueMeta_ for properties with corresponding name in instances of this _AdaptiveObjectType_.
propertyTypes.label: Property Types

referenceURI.brief: URI of more reference information about this object
referenceURI.description: URI of more reference information about this object.
referenceURI.label: Reference URI

runtime.brief: Runtime information, available to runtime objects
runtime.description: This is only valid for runtime object types. These are objects that are accessed with adaptorId afw. See afw_runtime.h for more information.
runtime.label: Runtime

tags.brief: List of keywords associated with this object type
tags.description: This is a list of keywords and terms associated with this object type. An instance of _AdaptiveTag_ can be used to define and document the purpose of a tag. Adaptive Framework reserves the definition of all tags that begin with '_Adaptive'.
tags.label: Tags
